message: You know what you should do, you so-called Adolf Reich, too chicken-sh1+ to use your real name. You need to put your freaking money where your mouth is and defend this country by volunteering for combat in the real military. But never mind, I doubt they would accept a loser like you. For your information there are a lot more of us """"idiots, minorities, liberals, women, Muslims, Jews, blacks and Hispanics"""" that will be voting. Go back into your troll hole where you belong.

FYI The Real Math (As of June, 4th, 2016) Total Number of Delegates Available = 4763 CURRENT Score Hillary Clinton = 1769 Bernie Sanders = 1501 Total Number of Delegates Required to Clinch the Nomination = 2383 Total Number of Delegates Remaining = 1493 Total Number of Delegates Who Vote on June 4th Through June 14th, 2016 = 930 No Candidate Can Clinch the Nomination Before June 14, 2016 Hillary Clinton Would Need 614 out of 930 Bernie Sanders Would Need 882 out of 930 Total Number of Delegates Who Vote on July 25th, 2016 = 719 (Democratic National Convention) The Nomination Will Be Decided on July 25th, 2016. So stop saying she has won

I love how any counter to Nancy's claims are """"hateful"""" or """"negative"""". She posts a couple of anecdotal items she believes Trump is """"fixing"""", Kim responds with details and questions and it's """"negative"""" and """"hateful"""" and she isn't discussing """"facts"""". And yet anyone who doesn't support or believe a word Trump says has filters over THEIR ears. That's some serious cognitive dissonance and projection, Nancy. Just because you enjoy being gaslit doesn't mean the rest of us are too stupid to realize what's happening.

It's important to note that JJ is actually played by an actor with Cerebral Palsy, although he is verbal. Disabled actors playing disabled characters.

This is where Liberalism, and the subsequent desire for a nanny state, fails. It is not the government's job to babysit us. We have our own liberty in this nation, at least for now, and we are to exercise it. It is indeed unfortunate that mental illness played a factor here, but unless someone reaches out for help, or a family member were to commit her for evaluation, there is not really much the city could (or should) do.

Miguel, it has nothing to do with """"liking"""". Just to repeat the obvious: it is NOT a coup. By the way, the process has not even finished. Talita, there is sufficient evidence for the parties to vote for the """"admissibility """" of the impeachment. That's where we stand at the moment. There are still 6 months of judgment ahead.

Hank, I am all for using """"incentives"""" as a motivator for change that is good for """"we the people,"""" especially when trying to modify an entrenched mindset such as fossil fuel powered cars. Please keep in mind that only the first 200,000 cars get the break.
